channel.title: Marion County Rescue Squad | Fairmont WV | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/MarionCountyRescueSquad/

item.title: Photos from Marion County Rescue Squad's post
item.description: Today MCRS staff trained on “Beyond the RIT: Medical Rescue” which covered responding to Firefighter Down emergencies, a new class offered by WV Public Service Training - Clarksburg. Training covered methods of rapidly doffing firefighter turnout gear, methods of rapid removal from the fireground, and treating firefighters in cardiac arrest. Additionally, crews discussed logistics and operational matters in the event of a “MAYDAY” or “Urgent Message” on the fireground. MCRS responds to numerous structure fires every year as medical standby and also provides fireground rehabilitation. Being able to respond to such calls involving our fellow first responders is very near and dear to us!

item.title: Photos from Marion County Rescue Squad's post
item.description: Football has arrived in Marion County! Crews are standing by East/West Stadium and Fairmont State University this evening! Crews even got to meet the new Freddie! MCRS wishes everyone a safe and healthy season!
